CustomField.description: Advance Fee % minus the Broker Fee % based on Broker Fee Paid When and Broker Fee Paid by Whom
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK( TEXT( Advance__r.Deal__r.Broker_Fee_Paid_When__c )), AND( ISPICKVAL( Advance__r.Deal__r.Broker_Fee_Paid_When__c , 'Each Initial Advance') , ISPICKVAL( Advance__r.Deal__r.Broker_Fee_Paid_By_Whom__c , 'CoreVest'))) , Property__r.Deal__r.Fee__c - Property__r.Broker_Advance_Fee_Perc__c, Property__r.Deal__r.Fee__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Advance Fee % minus the Broker Fee % based on Broker Fee Paid When and Broker Fee Paid by Whom
CustomField.label: Advance Fee % Minus Broker Fee %
